ygData.subject: Re: Anyone out there grouping with druids?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I have had the same druid partner since level 4 and he does use the thron shield spell on me quite often, usually if we fight a white or harder mob. It s
ygData.messageBody:
>From: John Kim <kim@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: [eqbards] Anyone out there grouping with druids?
>Date: Fri, 28 May 1999 14:38:05 -0400 (EDT)
>
>From: John Kim <kim@...>
>
>Druids have some nifty damage shield spells. These are the
>kind that do damage to the attacker every time you're hit.
>Since bards often end up being the mob magnet, I was wondering
>if anyone had tried getting a druid to cast a couple of these
>on you (there are two types - one low damage/long duration,
>one high damage/short duration, both stack - cast the latter
>just as a fight starts).
>
>I just started using these with my L9 druid character, and I
>can attack two or three blue mobs at once. By the time I've
>finished the first, the other two are down to about half hp
>just from beating on me. Of course, these are goblins who
>tend to be pretty wimpy fighters in the first place.
>

I have had the same druid partner since level 4 and he does use the thron
shield spell on me quite often, usually if we fight a white or harder mob.
It's very nice - unfortunately, i don't think the more powerful version can
be cast on other players..i think it's self only..??

Sartori D'Elsiraad
Bard of Kelethin of the 12th Chorus
Veeshan
